name: Shrink-up!
description:
Game made for #minijam96 !

-Controls-

Keyboard:

-W and D to move Left/Right

-S to Fast Fall

-Q/R to dash left/right

-P to restart level

Gamepad (PS/Xbox):

-Left Stick to move left/right

-Left Down to Fast Fall

-L2/R2(R1/R1, LT/RT, etc) to dash left/right

-SELECT/SHARE to reset level

-CREDITS-

Music,  Modelling and Programming by me (LucasCodeBreak)
